name: Secret Files
long_description: A small structure more like a room than anything else in the mind-warped metaverse. The encoding here is clearly state of the art, so why was it hidden in a smashed up exterior? In front of you is a representation of a sleek ebony table with two large tablets facing towards you. As a skilled hacker, you immediately recognize what is on the right tablet- it is the same flashing encrytion as you saw outside! On the left is a string of symbols that doesn't quite make any sense at all, super frustrating, and no man pages in sight. The only clue is an extension of .video.
short_description: A small room with two tablets- on the right encryption and on the left something even less recognizable.

room_features.name: Cat Videos from the Internet
room_features.description: OMG! It's a fat orange cat in a dinosaur custome! He's not even doing anything, just yelling at the camera! Sooo cute!

room_features.name: Nuclear Launch Codes
room_features.description: No use for these. But the Police might be interested...
